website_summaries.verdict: Whether you are starting seedlings or growing an all-season indoor garden, its functions make it capable of producing greens and flowers that impress.
pros: Earns rave reviews for its dual-chip technology, full-spectrum light, and 1000 watts of power ideal for all growth stages
Runs fairly cool and covers areas up to 5.1 feet by 4.7 feet
cons: Issues with bulbs burning out is a common complaint
but many more happy customers rave about its good qualities

customer_reviews.title: MH or HPS full spec Better PAR, 1/8 the power draw and 1/8th the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been growing indoors since the mid 70's This is the first light I have seen that could compare to a high wattage (1k) HID, MH or HPS full spec Better PAR, 1/8 the power draw and 1/8th the heat. This little bugger draws 3.3 Amps (183 watts) and puts out as much an growth as any 1,000 watt lighting system I have ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick C.

customer_reviews.title: They work great
customer_reviews.text: They work great, best investment. I'm hundred percent satisfied with the product. I would and will recommended it to all my friends Christopher Robinson
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just go for this grow light
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing light!! I have 0.8x0.8x1.6 meter grow tent. I grow tomato, strawberry, watermelon, cloves, and most importantly, my beloved Medinah mint❤️ both in soil and hydroponically. As shown in the photos, my tomato loves this light in both soil and water, they are growing rapidly!. Watermelon and cloves I have germinated them from seeds using this light and they are doing great. My medinah mint is exploding and growing in all directions. I STRONGLY recommend this light but using a taller tent because it is intense.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Gives off good heat
customer_reviews.text: Easy plug in and turn on, but I wish the metal hangers were adjustable
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Fusco

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these 3 weeks ago. I put my plants into flower then and so far the bud growth has been great. I used to run one 600 watt hps and one 300 watt LED. The 300 watt LED is 3 years old. The new lights so far have impressed me and the bud growth is incredible. Im still skeptical of the LED lights so ill post and update in about 6 more weeks. There is a learning curve for the lights due to the heat they produce. I had to add a fan and increase my air output to keep the temps in my tent at 77.
customer_reviews.author: Max.Rainey

customer_reviews.title: I love these lights
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 1000 watt in a 5 by 5 tent plants are getting huge. I also have 3 1200 watts in a 8 by 4 tent. No heat
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Power Of The Sun In My House
customer_reviews.text: Lights are great. Worth every penny & that's a really good price for such an awesome LED Set up
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Mojo Risin

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement?
customer_reviews.text: Upon doing some research on Bestvas website and looking at what was posted on Amazon, I find conflicting information. If this is the case, I want my money back and so should you. UPDATE: STOP HARASSING ME! I KEEP GETTING EMAILS (EVEN AFTER CONTACTING AMAZON) TO CEASE ALL COMMUNICATION. THIS IS NOT OK!
customer_reviews.author: Ben Dayho

customer_reviews.title: Chinese Junk! Steer clear!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a total of 4 of these things over the past 12-18 months. All but one has multiple rows of leds out and the bright pinks have turned dull orange! What a sham.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Misleading product description!
customer_reviews.text: This light is NOT 2000W. It is less than 400W. The manufacturer claims it is sufficient for a grow space of greater than 7'X7' but mapping its footprint with a PAR meter shows a usable footprint of about two square feet at 12 inches above the plants, with BOTH switches on. Sending it back! EDITED: 12/11/19 Interesting response from the manufacturer to my review: "Through your negative comments , we feel so sorry our product not to your expectations. So we want to refund $150. So that you can buy what you want in Black Friday." No money, credit, or gift card ever appeared.
customer_reviews.author: GPSPOWELL

customer_reviews.title: Bright lights and Happy Plants.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 of the 1000 watt models. They arrived together in identical boxes. They have different model numbers printed on their stickers and give off dif light colors. The company contacted me and sent me a replacement for the defective light and these are working perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bestva customer care saves the day
customer_reviews.text: Original review: Mine had a defective bulb that was not noticed until 2 days after the return date had expired just 62 days after my purchase... Update: I am pleased to say that after communicating with the seller and providing evidence, they fully refunded my money hassle free. I have since purchased another Bestva which I love. This was world class customer care. Thank you for making things right!
customer_reviews.author: T. Samuels

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lights
customer_reviews.text: My plants love this light. I have bought 3 of them now. First grow in a 4x8 produced just under 2lbs of dried product. Plants seem to love it. Just know that if you get a few of these suckers and they're all running you might pop a breaker. Definitely put off some heat and in a 4x8 tent I had to keep the ac and fans pushing the cold into the tent because of the heat. Will raise the temp in a tent to 90+ real quick
customer_reviews.author: Jaymie

customer_reviews.title: Par light no where near that of a 1000 HPS
customer_reviews.text: I tested this lights output and performance against my other HPS bulbs with a light meter and found that it barely had 1/3rd of the lumen a hortilux 1000 watt HPS has. No competition whatsoever. Results were dramatically poor in comparison for an 8 week trial.
customer_reviews.author: Wakerider

customer_reviews.title: A real treat to own!
customer_reviews.text: These things rock! I've bought two of them! The plants seemed to explode with growth after even the first day with these new lights! Great price, Fast shipping, this is the led grow light you are looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Cheffrin

customer_reviews.title: Great Lights!
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 of these now for my 5x10 tent. Started with 2 plants staggered by a month. great growth and plenty of LUX at 10 inches. No burning if the plant gets close so the light runs cool.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B

customer_reviews.title: I’m Very pleased with the performance but
customer_reviews.text: Decided to see what the LED hype is all about, purchased three 1000w along with three other 300w. I under estimated the power! Veg at 18” Flower at 12”! Crispy leaves and fox tails will definitely happen over time at 5-8 inches! I’m Very pleased with the performance but.... within a month of use I had the cooling fan fail in one of them. It makes the most horrific sound and has been boxed since.. So buyer beware, this LED’s ability to produce is equal to “high-end” marketed LED’s but the quality isn’t on PAR.
customer_reviews.author: Colt

customer_reviews.title: Liked it so much, I bought another one!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 4' deep x 6' wide grow tent, and had hoped that one of the 2000 watt lights would be enough. I may have, but when I learned about using light movers, I decided to get another one. It's amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Rogers

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING LED
customer_reviews.text: I received the light and my seedlings are loving it... packaged was secured. Easy to setup. Runs cool to the touch. All diodes are working on this 1000w Bestva led... will definitely be purchasing another in a few days... keep up the good work
customer_reviews.author: Jermaine

customer_reviews.title: Great light, works well and very bright
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this light to replace t12 fixtures and the plants seem to like it a lot, very bright light and easy to mount. Awesome light for the money , going to buy another one soon. Would recommend to anyone who doesn't want to use hid lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Tom S

customer_reviews.title: Bought Two - Both lost almost all LED lights (in the same order) with minimal use.  TO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Used 1-2 months a year preparing seedlings in the Spring for my outdoor garden (This would have been year two). Only 10 LEDs light up and I'm on only on the 2nd season of use. Complete failure. Bought two and both failed in the same way within a week of each other. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: CMEA

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lights!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these lights a few years ago, had a slight issue with them. But the customer service sent me new lights that work great and are better than the originals. The new lights have bloom and veg switches and work great no issues. I like how they take care of their customers and i like how they have made their lights better. They run cooler than HPS lights and do a better job. I will buy them again they are A#1 in my book.
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: 9 months old and failing
customer_reviews.text: Began to fail 9 months old on a 6 hr on 2 hr off 24 hr cycle. on flower cycle had to buddy up with vistiva led to keep the light on 12 hrs still did 6 on then of 30 then back 31/2 hrs to get 12 hr for bloom. flowered okay. the 1000 watt hps had much denser buds. Has anyone had one of these in constant use last the warranty length
customer_reviews.author: wild bill

customer_reviews.title: Don't last long
customer_reviews.text: I gave 5 star for shipping proformance on the other hand not so we'll half the lights stopped working after 6 months of use 12 hours on and 12 off I have other ones for over a year on 18 on and 6 off and there still working good. Thought it had a year warranty but don't see how to contact the seller anymore .
customer_reviews.author: Jarod's Auto and Tire

customer_reviews.title: Full spectrum yes, but...
customer_reviews.text: These maybe full spectrum but you do not have an option to set modes for vegetative and flowering growth cycles and that may matter depending on what you're growing. I use a couple of these lights to fill in areas where my main lights need help. Have used them for one grow cycle and can't really say how well they perform at this point. They give off a surprising about of heat for such small fixtures, so keep them at the appropriate distance (24" at least) from your plants.
customer_reviews.author: Hard T. PleaseTop Contributor: Hydroponics

customer_reviews.title: OK, but much better options available
customer_reviews.text: I've been running 2 of the 1000W lights for about a month now. They're not terrible, but there are MUCH better options available. I'm running 2 lights in a 2x4 tent and consider that a minimum for veg and flower. The company's footprint is ridiculously optimistic. Even for early veg, I'm using a hanging height of 15-16" without problems. The efficiency of 64 lumens/watt is way behind what is currently available at competitive prices. Save your money and have a look at the quantum boards offered by Horticultural Light Group. The HLG65, HLG100, QB120 and QB132 would be better choices. Atreum also makes good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: A. Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Strong blue spectrum
customer_reviews.text: In all the review photos the light seems to have more red spectrum than blue but the light I received is shining bright blue spectrum and that is not what someone expects when purchasing this light ! Considering the light color ratio is drastically larger for the red color I dont understand what the hell kind of light I got from bestva but I dont think it's the correct model I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: ... different LED lights to compare and this one seems better than the other (1000W LED Grow Light
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two different LED lights to compare and this one seems better than the other (1000W LED Grow Light, Supmovo LED Grow Light Kit - white color) . The fan noise is not as loud as the other ones but still not quiet enough for me. Kept on for few hours now... Works well so far. Let's see how the plants likes these light ! Will post again after few weeks
customer_reviews.author: Jon K, VA

customer_reviews.title: Works ok, the one I got in Nov is slightly red heavy and the one I got in Dec is far too blue heavy.
customer_reviews.text: It's working fine but doesn't seem quite as bright as my other, less expensive 1000w units. There are no daisy chain ports, veg/bloom switches, or reflectors/lenses you can get in simular priced units. A daisy chain plug would be a good addition. The light is reds heavy but has blues mixed in. The customer service is very friendly and helpful. Dec 14 update: I just got another one and this one is blue heavy. 48pcs blue, 30pcs red/orange, making this one the bluest I own. I think it should be the other way around but it does have 3 ir now. It
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: More heat than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Replaced two cheap heigh watt led / COB lights with this light. Light penetration is better with this light BUT I’m not happy with the amount of heat this light puts out. I’m running the 2000 in a 4x4 tent with a portable a/c unit and dehumidifier for my plants, can’t get tent under 78 degrees because of the heat from the new light My two old lights 260watt draw each and my tent temps stayed in the 60s Something to consider folks Will see how these new lights finish off these girls over the next few weeks for more information on this light
customer_reviews.author: hattrick

customer_reviews.title: Great for flowering!
customer_reviews.text: This light is amazing. My plants immediately smiled when I switched out the generic crappy one I had bought that said it was 1000w but was putting out only 450 lumens. This bad boy is putting out 15k lumens with the plants being 3 ft away.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Billups

customer_reviews.title: Excellent light!  More efficiency, less heat loss!  3 year warrantee.
customer_reviews.text: This light and all hardware arrived very promptly with all accessories included and working perfectly. When unpackaged and set up, it was simple hang. The heat I expected from such a brilliant 1000 Watt LED light was...well...extremely minimal compared to other lights of the 1000W range. The Best VA 1000W LED light even has two built-in cooling fans. I've never found the light to be hot or burning to the touch as one would expect...and where there's little heat all of your electricity is being converted to light instead of profits for the electric company.
customer_reviews.author: P. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Only Red works...Cheap product - instant garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap product - Three year warranty is not real...Bestva has no customer service contact information, only a China phone number...avoid....Third party seller...no customer service or returns.
customer_reviews.author: daun e.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste money...quit working after one month minimal use
customer_reviews.text: Lights have burnt out after just a month of use. I wish I wouldn’t have waited so long to use so I’d know they were not high quality. Bummer. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: AshLeeAnn

customer_reviews.title: Quality company you can trust
customer_reviews.text: I was a big fan of this light until a large section of the LEDs went. This unit has only been in operation for three weeks at 18hrs a day. I was expecting to at least get a year or two out of my nearly $400 dollar investment. They claim unit has a 3yr warranty. I’ve contacted Bestva. I’m confident they will make this right. I will update review pending their response. Update BESTVA completely replaced my light. BESTVA 100% stands behind their warranty and dealing with customer service was easy and upfront. The new light arrived within one week and performs well. You can trust this company. Thank you BESTVA!
customer_reviews.author: Elissa

customer_reviews.title: Takes a lot of sweat out of things
customer_reviews.text: This piece of equipment shows just what LED's are capable of. It far exceeded all expectations with it's powerful performance, low energy usage and low heat output. Very compact, sturdy and cost effective.
customer_reviews.author: Mad Scientist

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Ive only used it for a few days now. Very bright, seems like very good quality. Ive got one hemp plant under it and one bell pepper plant on either side. I have two of these lights and hope to get the second one up and running tomorrow. Then put the two bell peppers under it. The plan is to buy more over the winter and produce veggie starts early to sell at farmers markets in the spring. I will update here when I get a better idea of how these three plants are doing.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: The light uses less power then listed in the website data for Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Brand new out of box yesterday, I tested the the claimed wattage use of the light. input voltage is 124 volts. both red and blue sections on is 464 watts of total power use, not the 615 listed in the website data. red lights on only is 225 watts and blue only is 246 watts. there is a missing 145 +/- watts of power that is not part of the light output? I would like to hear from other users and there reported power draw from this 3000 watt? light.... I will be posting more updates on the light as it is used over the next few months.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Boy

customer_reviews.title: I have and will continue to buy from this brand
customer_reviews.text: These lights are high quality and work extremely well. The light output is blinding and plants love it. The heat output is definitely low, but still there. If in a small space it will heat quickly. The one complaint I have is the cables to hold the lights have slipped out of their crimp and dropped a light on to one of the plants. We replaced it with a thicker gauge of sturdy wire and haven't had issues since. I have and will continue to buy this brand. Out of the several different lights received, none have had manufacturing defects and all leds have worked.
customer_reviews.author: pacpac

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: Working excellently. Don't be fooled by the soft pink light -- this thing is very powerful and your eyes will need adjusting after being in the same room as this light, even for a short while. I suggest turning the light off upon entry and back on upon exit from the room. My plants have been under this ligth for just a few days, and they are already booming in growth! Light came with a cable that was not fitting very evenly, but the seller was quick to respond and resolve the issue. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Desent buget light
customer_reviews.text: For the money this was a desent entry level light.Customer service was good
customer_reviews.author: josh ledington

customer_reviews.title: Burnt out after 8 mos.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4 of these lights less than 8 mos. ago and one of them has already burnt out. Low humidity and cared for properly. Just fizzled out. Started shorting out and now its completely dead.
customer_reviews.author: Guinea pig mom

customer_reviews.title: Very well made quiet fans and not much heat for the size..
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with the quality of the bestva and for the money it was the best I found. I use this light for flowering and was so pleased I got the bestva 1200 elite for my veg. I had a question about the hanger on the 1200 so I emailed them and got a good answer back from customer service in 15 minutes. I highly recommend this product. And I'm sure I will be ordering from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade if your looking for higher yield
customer_reviews.text: was looking for an upgrade as i was using 2 45watt led lights and had ok results with it, this time around, (my second grow) i was looking to up the quality and got this 1000watt light and the difference is....day and night. also love the fact that its very easy to use, easy to set up, and its relatively quite when the fans run. def a must buy if u have a 3x3 or 4x4, even a 5x5 would work...will update as months pass, but after a couple days im happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Elmer Aragrev

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I've run this light for a few months and it has easily out performed my old hps while using a fraction of the power and producing less heat. My plants have much denser foliage and don't stretch nearly as much. Overall not quite as good as natural sunlight, but still a great light for the price.
customer_reviews.author: mason

customer_reviews.title: BestVA is the best I've used so far
customer_reviews.text: So far this is the best light I've ever seen and Ive seen a few.... lol Im still waiting to see the flower but right off the bat my plants exploded with energy. Nice leathery leaves and no scorching or yellow underbrush. I could not be happier neither could my plants. 2000w LED
customer_reviews.author: m.gray

customer_reviews.title: Burn out frequently
customer_reviews.text: So I have ordered 4 of the 1000 watt versions for my indoor garden. ALL repeat ALL of them have have lost light segments and needed replacements . Typically the white LEDs go out first. Replacement fixtures were sent out first than just the lighting boards were sent out (pain to replace) Obviously poor manufacturing and quality control issues . I will be looking for a better built and hopefully longer lasting replacements. I suggest looking elsewhere and save yourself the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: joey m.

customer_reviews.title: Wow, powerful. Bright.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a variety of "NASA LED" grow lights(2 in the photo) in the past. This one is by far more powerful than all the others combined. Time will tell how durable it is, as many have died after only a single season. It arrived in just a couple of days, rather than weeks-from-China-Surprise! Picture is take from just below the light, showing how well all the plants installed, also greenhouse when empty before the coldfront last night. It has fans so there is some noise when on.
customer_reviews.author: TexARC, aka A.Ron Carmichael

customer_reviews.title: Bright and a boost to production
customer_reviews.text: The light is well-designed, very easy to install. I love the adjustable aspect. I used to have to deal with hooks and chains. We have had it on out plants for almost two weeks and by the end of the first week, could see a noticeable increase in plant size and production. The light spread is surprisingly good and even. Our garden is about 4x5 feet. I am very happy with this light. If our garden expands, I will definitely buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Cotrupe

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: Reached out to them, have yet to get a response. This is 7-8 months of use. More than 3 burned out, states they have a three year warranty.... someone needs to contact everyone requesting support or amazon should pull it. It’s honestly dangerous, as you can see from other photos not just mine.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Gray

customer_reviews.title: It arrived very quickly and seems to be working great!
customer_reviews.text: We use this for growing our plants in a little room. Our old ballast burned out and fried the MH bulb we were using. Hard to find ballasts that stay cool enough for our little growing area so we thought it would be a perfect time to go LED. We researched, read reviews, and settled on this one. So far, we're very happy. We received it quickly and the plants are growing very well. It's very bright, maybe even too much light for our little area - some is probably wasted - but better too much than too little. It stays very cool, also which is a definite plus.
customer_reviews.author: Yoyoloach

customer_reviews.title: I came back to leave my review 2 years later.
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased this light a while ago, and did not review it at the time of purchase. 2 years and 1 month after purchase, and having grown a lot of plants with it, sadly one of the boards stopped lighting up. I contacted the seller on 12-02-2019 for warranty information and included a picture of the light. I was asked for my name, address and phone number, to which I replied. The next day I received notice my new light was on the way. I am leaving this review today 12-9-2019, very satisfied with my warranted light. I currently own three of these in various sizes and will gladly be buying my fourth soon.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome light, Awesome Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Do not be afraid of this grow light. Im on my second grow with this light. Trust me, it gets the job done with its full spectrum lighting. My plants love this light. While halfway through the second grow the vent fans failed. The LED's still worked. I contacted Bestva by email and they sent me out a brand new light in 4 days from sending email to receiving at my door. Their customer service and warranty are as good as the product. I will be purchasing another light from them in the near future. Don't hesitate to try this light, you won't be disappointed.😎🏝️
customer_reviews.author: Billy E. Pickell, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Times they are a changing.
customer_reviews.text: Unbeatable for the price. If you just want something that works at an affordable price this is your ticket. I would suggest you treat them as a 600 W HPS and not as of 1000 W HPS. I will never turn my HID'S on again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bestva dc 2000w led grow lights
customer_reviews.text: These are great lights. The par output outshines most of the other lights in this range. They do run a little hot so be prepared to need to cool ur tent or room if using multiple My only complaint so to say. I ordered two of the 2000w dc series. They are slightly different. One has glass going all the way across and the other has two gaps of glass on the edges as the picture shows ... is one of these a defective product !?
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: It is very bright!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. My plants have never looked so good. It is a very bright light, so use the sunglasses that come with it. I like that it is a led light. Very reasonable to run for The wattage. It is supposed to be good for flowering and fruit or vegetables but haven’t had it long enough yet to see. The light is very well constructed with a cable and locking hoist system. I would definitely purchase this product if you are growing inside. The plants stay short and don’t get stemmy. I would purchase this product from the seller. Packaging was very good and shipping was quick. THANKS
customer_reviews.author: Walt

customer_reviews.title: Bright, But Mine Came Damaged
customer_reviews.text: The light is very bright however I do not have a lumens meter to check the actual output or its spectrum capabilities. My only issue with the product is that one of the support cables came frayed so I cant actually use the product since I have nothing to support it with. I will update with how the seller handles this issue and I hope to update in a future review how well the light promotes growth if I am able to use the light . 12/2/19 Update: The seller came through and provided amazing customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Dong

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This light runs so hot even from 3 feet away it burns my plants from heat stress to the point of death. No purpose in running LED if I have to install venting ducts. All my other LEDs from other manufacturers work fine from 18 inches away from plants.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Hathaway

customer_reviews.title: Good light for the money awesome customer service
customer_reviews.text: These lights work well. We bought two of them for our hydro set up. The problem we’ve run into is that part of the panel ends up going out. The company goes above and beyond with their customer service however. They replaced both lights for us under warranty.
customer_reviews.author: J. Woods

customer_reviews.title: stopped working
customer_reviews.text: After 120 days, three year warranty-please contact us as soon as possible, (from the user instructions booklet) the four exhaust fans all stopped working. the LED light smelled hot so I unplugged it and won't turn it on again for safety reasons. I have sent over twenty emails and messages from the company's website and not heard back from them. My plants that were flowering are now hermies because I couldn't get a replacement light for several days. So, four months and $$$ later I have a broken light and my medical cannabis is now compost. Buy American.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Better, brighter lights on the market for same price. Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Liked the light, worked well until 2/3 of the veg lights stopped working less than a year since I purchased. Also produces significant heat but the fans should run in reverse to remove heat from plants not blow heat down and outward so it’s hard to exhaust the heat produced by the light. Update-1-9-2020 I reached out to Bestva via email to inform them of my issue with their product. They gave me a full refund without any hassle. For that I felt like it was a company that stood by their customers even if the light may have be defective. Thanks Bestva
customer_reviews.author: Justin Huckabee

customer_reviews.title: very Brite
customer_reviews.text: So far so good ,amazingly Brite just purchased another , then found they have a 2400 watt available now , will post updates accordingly
customer_reviews.author: jesse rozell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: So here is my update on this product. So I have had this for 3 months. Found out this morning the lamp has burned out taking the power cord with it. No very reliable for 3 months of use. The customer service contacted me and they replaced the unit free of charge. This I have to say is well worth it. Will do business again with them. Excellent service. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Ross

customer_reviews.title: Great price for 2k!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a 600w hps with the 2k bestva led light. At first I was disappointed by the size of the light, it looks longer in the photo. It is actually less than 2ft long. I hung it very high to get maximum coverage of the canopy. It's very bright and covered a 6 ft by 3ft area. It has more heat than I thought for a led light. This is my first Chinese made light. The price is great, less than half my USA made lights. So far it is doing great! I've been using it for about 3wks, the plants look great.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip m Bohde

customer_reviews.title: Awesome light, only two personal preferences that are not featured on 1000w
customer_reviews.text: I, just like many other growers, decided i wanted to test out LEDs for indoor plants. I figured a basic little guy like this would be a good start to see the difference between LED full spectrum and hps. The two downsides to this is the fact i cant daisy chain multiple lights together and also there is no bloom / veg switch so its full spectrum the entire time. Besides those two personal preferences the light was a great investment. I started from seeds and could see the difference right from the get go. If you are like me, reading reviews after reviews to pick the right thing then i would recommend this light to you.
customer_reviews.author: omgbatman

customer_reviews.title: Decent lights
customer_reviews.text: If you've ever used a Mars, Advanced or black dogg you can tell these are cheap but decent. The heat they put out is insane for what they are. 2 heated up a 10x10 room to 90 degrees even when cooled with 2 fans exhaust out of the room for sure will be needed. if youre looking for something cheap this is the way
customer_reviews.author: Mcdougle

customer_reviews.title: No BS here, these are good.
customer_reviews.text: Built well, seems pretty sturdy. Switching over from MH, my plants are loving these lights. I purchased the 2000w DC series. Flowering and veg with it now, will update the results accordingly. You'll want some humidity to add to it, as the dry the air out more then HID. I also went and grabbed some led strips for the lower branches as they were abit wilted from lack of energy
customer_reviews.author: Tony Holt

customer_reviews.title: warning
customer_reviews.text: Look, this is a great light no doubt. The issue is BESTA shipping & Amazon shipping. If you want this light, do NOT expect it for weeks regardless of whatever the delivery is. Same for bestva direct website. At this point it's just not worth it i've found other lights basically the same as this and it gets to me promptly. This light is not a knight is shining armor just another competetive light that doesn't care to get its product to it's consumer promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Hinton

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made an overpriced for what it is and that's garbage
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made product. I've been using grow lights for many years now this is the second one I've gotten from them that has been junk don't waste your money on this company
customer_reviews.author: Joe kingspade

customer_reviews.title: Sprouts not growing. I'm not impressed
customer_reviews.text: So far doesn't seem to be doing much of anything for the germination seedling stage. Sprouts barely surfaced and now just sitting there looking patheticly small and frail. It may be better when developed farther but we will have to see. I'm not impressed. Maybe I expected too much. Puts off a lot of heat. Fans don't do much that I can tell. The heat comes from bottom. The fans don't seem to pull it very well.
customer_reviews.author: Weewo

customer_reviews.title: Love this light
customer_reviews.text: Always nerve-wracking to try to balance power vs. cost. I am very pleased with this light for veg and bloom. Very bright. I have two of them in my 5x10 tent... good coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Adel

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service, knowledgeable
customer_reviews.text: Still in the process of trying out. Was running s little hot so I reached out to them. They were incredibly responsive and helped ease my mind regarding my concerns. Hope to eventually bump this up to a 5 after I have a couple months under my belt with this light. Great company! UPDATE: I've been using for a little while now and couldn't be more please with my choice. After the fan get's going, it's really effective at cooling and with a little extra fan, the temps almost aren't a concern anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: I guess it's ok. Not much experience here on ...
customer_reviews.text: I guess it's ok. Not much experience here on my end with led lights. I have a 400 watt hps beside this bestva 2000w (really 400w) light in a tent.They hang 2 inches apart from one another. I have four of the exact same plants, two directly under the hps and two directly under the led and the two under the hps have more dense flowers than the two under the led. My previous comment was only a month or so into flowering.. after a couple of runs this light did great.
customer_reviews.author: jt

customer_reviews.title: it's good but not the best
customer_reviews.text: The MarsHydro 300w shows more growth, this is still a very nice light but I will stick with the mars in the future, I give it 3 stars as it is still better than natural sunlight outdoors
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 STAR LED!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights. I have bought 3 so far and am looking to buy one more in the near future to complete my garden. They're very bright, easy to set up, and ready to go straight out of the box. My plants have really responded well to them and i am very pleased with the lights performance. I highly recommend these to anyone wanting to start up a garden, or even those looking to upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Exxxellent lights !!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow these lights are kickin ass !!! My girls love them . In 2 weeks time they've filled out and up way way better then what Ive seen from my MH in that amount of time ever. I'm running them with both veg an flower together and the plants are going crazy . The only issue is short power cords . I replaced mine with 20ft cords to get out of my 8×12 room to my power source so I only have one complete cord per light. Two 2000w are perfect for my space . Like them so much I'm getting 2 more in the near future. XXX
customer_reviews.author: XXX Custom

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last
customer_reviews.text: Area coverage is low for the wattage. You can get a higher power light for less money. It only lasted two years, should last at least 3. For the last few months it dimmed significantly then diodes started going out after a two years of running it 20 hours a day.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Fans quit working after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Fans on the light unit quit working after 3 months of use. When I discovered the fans not working, the unit was abnormally hot. I contacted customer support right away hoping I could get a replacement unit since I’m at the end of a grow cycle. It’s been 7 days and nobody has contacted me, I would stay away from this company and use a different brand of lights.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Cielec

customer_reviews.title: this light sucks . I would need two of them to light up my  5x5 grow tent.
customer_reviews.text: This light is not powerful enough for my 60x60x80 tent . Very disappointed. I tried to give bestva a chance and I bought the samsun elite and it was not any better I wish I would have bought a samsung lm301b quantumn board and be way happier.
customer_reviews.author: MCXI

customer_reviews.title: Best light ever! Must buy
customer_reviews.text: I'm writing a review after having this light for over 1 year. Its great quality, gives results and a big plus the customer service is amazing! I will definitely purchase this light and only this light as long as they have it. If you have any questions they are quick to respond. Any problem gets resolved in minutes. Your light will last for a very long time. I love this light!
customer_reviews.author: Betty Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Very positive experience
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Light works perfectly. Only had for 2 weeks so cant speak for growth rates or finished product but looks real good so far. Had a question for the seller and they got back to me next day. I was surprised at how small the unit is but that is a bonus as it has a real good coverage area. It is quiet and produces almost no heat. Uses way less electricity than a HPS or MH.
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I had been using 2 1000W LEDs that were the cheaper lower quality generic type, after putting this light in the difference was immediately noticable. It is super bright and plants showed a noticable difference!!! Highly recommended!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Adams

customer_reviews.title: Moving garden indoors for the winter
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased this item to facilitate moving my Carolina Reaper hot peppers indoors for the winter. My fluorescent lamps didn't do well last year and the plants almost died before they got natural sunlight. Will update review with plant progress. NOTE: This lamp is dangerously bright. Always wear the proper LED safety glasses. Do NOT turn this on for the first time while looking at it!
customer_reviews.author: J. D HUNT

customer_reviews.title: great until the fans quit
customer_reviews.text: This light worked well for 4 months. On the fourth month the fans quit working and I only noticed because i could smell something hot. I got it shut off before anything bad happened. The light did great for my starts and I had a good growth rate unfortunately it just wasn't built to last.
customer_reviews.author: mychal miller

customer_reviews.title: Very good light 1000W very cheap monthly cost to run
customer_reviews.text: I’m loving the grow light I got the 1000W grow light for very cheap and so far so good it’s been about a month and a half maybe a little longer I have a very small set up and my 5 gallon and little seedling in the back is loving this light not really any burning on my plant even though the lights at max height and the plants not very far from the bottom of the light but once again loving it so far Would reccommend to anyone with a indoor set up I hardly even notice a difference in light bill
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comments from Real Bestva users
customer_reviews.text: I'm into a little more than 3 weeks using these lights. So far so good! I just put these girls into flower because of the different heights of 3 different strains. I read a lot of negative comments left by people. Calling these light cheap junk. I would like to hear from someone who has used these lights and their opinions on them.
customer_reviews.author: Shon O'Neill

customer_reviews.title: Better than my estimates.
customer_reviews.text: No manufacturer gives data pertinent to normal needs. I propagate 10 to 1 ratio from germination flats (1020 standard). My estimate was wrong and the 1000 watt lamp so exceeded expectations I'm adding 7 inches width and 22 length to the table. 14 flats will get sufficient light. 55 inches X 70 inches. 6 additional germination flats is 60 final flats for me. That pays for the lamp (+ some) the first year. This is at 36 inch height above seeds though I could lower it some without significant changes.
customer_reviews.author: Terry in America

customer_reviews.title: Good budget light for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: Ample coverage in a 2x4x5 foot tent. Worked good in a 4x4x7 ft tent too. Probably overkill for the baby tomatoes, but it’s pretty much as bright as a sunny day. Small kine heavy, but it really gets the job done. 10/10 would recommend Update Oct. 14th: it’s still very bright. One of the fans died out so the countdown begins. You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: Philip Kitamura

customer_reviews.title: Impressive light fixture
customer_reviews.text: Thus far, i am VERY impressed with this fixture. The light output is much, much higher than I had anticipated, which is a very positive thing. It appears to be very well made, runs quietly considering it has two fans, and puts out very little heat. This was a great purchase! Okay, I need to add something - this fixture is so impressive that I have already ordered and received a second one!
customer_reviews.author: Gryphon

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a 1,000W led.
customer_reviews.text: I had a 600 W Bestva from a year ago. I wanted a little more power. The tomato, veggie, and herb plants love the spectrum. It runs relatively cool, and only uses 250 watts or so. I am overjoyed with the purchase and the health of the plants. I googled some reviews of best or top 1,000 watt LED.. Bestva is in the top 5 or 10 lights available today. They Tweaked the spectrum a little since last year. Its 50% better than the 600 W. uses 50% more power. Maybe I will have 50% more veggies soon.
customer_reviews.author: TIMOTHY  W  MOE

customer_reviews.title: Very bright, covers 4 x 4 tent easily
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these. I am running them 24/7. My plants 'love them'. They are quite quiet even tho they have 2 fans and are really bright. I had to raise them up 36 inches to avoid 'light burn'. I would like to see a swivel on the hanger so I could rotate the lamp to be square with tent but that's just to satisfy my autistic side. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: RobC

customer_reviews.title: Great LED light and Great Support
customer_reviews.text: This 1000W LED works great and puts out just enough heat to keep everything a nice summery temp even in the winter. The customer support is also great and super responsive, one of my lights had about half the LEDs fail suddenly after a few months and BESTVA simply sent me a replacement right away.
customer_reviews.author: SF

customer_reviews.title: If you cant cmh or hps then led
customer_reviews.text: For this price should have a daisy chain. And a better hanger harness the clips were bending before it got the full weight of the light
customer_reviews.author: tone

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it for the $$$
customer_reviews.text: There's no heat to speak of and ranks with lights 3 times the money. Really is a great light however don't believe that it covers 7 ft or more. How bout the truth 4 ft plus. customer_reviews.title: This is a great light, but do your research!
customer_reviews.text: Do your research! LED grow lights are getting better and better, and this light is alway in the top 10, and will usually be in the top 5. DO NOT TAKE MY WORD FOR IT! customer_reviews.title: The lamp set works as expected. I have operated ...
customer_reviews.text: The lamp set works as expected. I have operated it for just over a week now and can not say how it is affecting plant growth. It is illuminating a new olive tree and a tomato plant that is about 2.5 months old. This is the first plant growth light I own. customer_reviews.title: Not as great as the reviews
customer_reviews.text: We did not get the same kind of yield that we had gotten in previous harvests when using these lights. And our power bill skyrocketed. Buyer beware.
